content:
published  October  

The University Law School will announce plans today to raise  million in private donations PERIOD
The campaign is part of the . billion Campaign Minnesota a fiveyear effort to raise money for scholarships technology and building improvements PERIOD
The capital campaign was designed to strategically place the Law School in a position to meet the needs and demands of training law students in the community said Terri Mische director of Law School alumni relations and communications PERIOD
Robert M PERIOD Kommerstad a  alumnus pledged  million to establish a business law and entrepreneurship center PERIOD
With Kommerstads gift and other donations the Law School has already reached  percent of the  million goal PERIOD
A model of the new building addition will also be unveiled PERIOD It is expected to be completed by August  PERIOD
The kickoff ceremony is scheduled to take place at  p.m PERIOD in the Auerbach Commons on the plaza level of the Law School PERIOD

Liz Bogut welcomes comments at emailprotected PERIOD
